title: You need to earn at least 15k gold to spend 50k gold
body:
Selling an item back to the shop refunds 70% of its purchase price. You can also sell items purchased with refunded gold. That means you can spend X, then recover X\*0.7, then spend that, then recover X\*0.7\*0.7, and so on, until you're buying pots. Mathematically, it's a [geometric convergence](http://www.wolframalpha.com/input/?i=sum_(n%3D0)%5E%E2%88%9E+0.7%5En), so if you could buy and sell items for infinitesimal fractions of a gold, you could spend 3 and 1/3 times as much as you earned (including starting gold).

  ∞
  ∑   0.7^n = 3 1/3
n=0

50k divided by 3 1/3 is 15k. This is doable in one or two matches, as long as you remember to return to the shop and do some buying and selling before the game finishes.
